::Lord Elder::
=A0
Elder allowed himself to sit and the shuttle maintained =
pursuit of the Minions. Something wasn't right. Elder drifts into his thoug=
hts, "If Rodimus had been corrupted then he would have no use for Atlantis.=
 There wasn't anything of value there. Legacy was making a best guess. That=
 was more troublesom. Legacy had had all the answers untill now. Noone know=
s where Rodimus is. Or noone survived long enough to tell anyone else..."

=
--- On Wed, 6/25/08, Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:

From:=
 Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...>
Subject: Re: At The Ark
To: nbwrp=
g@yahoogroups.com
Date: Wednesday, June 25, 2008, 6:53 AM









> ::Lord=
 Elder::
> 
> Elder looked around to the others in the shuttle.
> 
> Elder:=
 Well that changes things a bit. We don't have
> a Hot Rod to bring the Mat=
rix back too. Pilot, take off
> and follow those Minions. We'll help Legacy=
 with this.
> 
> The shuttle soon takes off and heads in the same direction=

> as Legacy and the Minions. They quickly catch up.
> 
> Elder: Continue t=
o fire at will.
> 
> The shuttle continues to fire plasma blasts at the Min=
ions.
=A0
Legacy continued moving after the minions, maintaining his commun=
ications block on them, trying to cut them off from reporting in to anyone =
else, as he shielding absorbed stray blasts and his hull singed under the m=
ore directed ones. 
=A0
(OOC:=A0It's up to you Airly as to when you reach A=
tlantis, or if one of us attackers=A0stops you first.)=A0
=A0
> OOC: I assu=
me you'll correct the Rodimus/Atlantis thing
> after you read my earlier po=
st. So I ignored that part.
=A0
OOC: I appreciate that, but I will leave it=
 as is. Legacy had said =A1conjectural analysis=A2 had led him to that stat=
ement, which meant that=A0it was a guess. That should lead Lord Elder to a =
disturbing guess on his part: "no one who knew where Dark Rodimus went, sur=
vived to give an accurate report." >:D
=A0
Plus as the timelines diverge Le=
gacy=A2s knowledge will become less and less accurate as things change, I d=
on=A2t mind him being wrong in this. However please ignore the part about S=
courge being on his way to Atlantis, that would not be true, he would be go=
ing to that old base. 
=A0
Preston(Legacy)
